title: Today is my birthday and...
body:
... I'll just play League with my husband all day. I don't want anything else.

Thank you Rito.

replies.body: Happy Birthday! ^-^
all i want is Taric rework. Never gonna happen .... Cries in spanish..

> [{quoted}](name=Maegges,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WwT2n71Q,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-11T16:54:23.364+0000)
>
> all i want is Taric rework. Never gonna happen .... Cries in spanish..

I main Taric and I am really scared of the rework.

> [{quoted}](name=OkamotoSenpai,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WwT2n71Q,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-11T17:17:26.270+0000)
>
> I main Taric and I am really scared of the rework.

Do you main Taric, or does Taric main you?
who tf mains {{champion:44}}

> [{quoted}](name=HyrulianSummoner,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WwT2n71Q,comment-id=000200000002,timestamp=2015-05-12T21:49:48.412+0000)
>
> who tf mains {{champion:44}}

This guy
Im not, i played him so often about 1000+ games that im getting real tired of his goofy looks. Atm he is smaller in size than    tristana so go for it riot.

> [{quoted}](name=Maegges,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WwT2n71Q,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-05-11T17:30:36.257+0000)
>
> Im not, i played him so often about 1000+ games that im getting real tired of his goofy looks. Atm he is smaller in size than    tristana so go for it riot.

You are confusing a Visual Update (that we all want) with a rework (that will come and I am not sure if I want it).
no my point was that because i hav played him too often and getting tired of how he looks and getting bored of how he is played mechanics wise its time he gets a new kit an a new look.

> [{quoted}](name=Maegges,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WwT2n71Q,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-11T17:47:39.113+0000)
>
> no my point was that because i hav played him too often and getting tired of how he looks and getting bored of how he is played mechanics wise its time he gets a new kit an a new look.

Have you played Taric jung buddy? It never gets boring.

i play him jungle if i am not allowed to support. I propably hav played him too often and had too much fun playing him as adc toplane midlane and jungler so yea i played him in all the roles its just getting so boring i need a new taric some nicely polished gems. that sounds weired XD
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Qw-h_yZ1ZQ
I think about this literally every time someone says Happy Birthday.  I haven't watched the cartoon in years and now that I've put it into words, I'll probably go crazy soon.
oh youre a grill? ;) hmu?
If they were capable of posting a forum, they are clearly not a grill. Grills are inanimate objects.

>
> oh youre a grill? ;) hmu?

I'm not.
Happy Birthday! {{summoner:14}} {{item:2052}} {{summoner:14}}
